name: Adventure Bros
description:
this game is inspired by DOUBLE SYNTH has the same system and core mechanics

and the game story is two brother and sister want some adventure

some asset that i used

https://grafxkid.itch.io/sprite-pack-3

https://grafxkid.itch.io/seasonal-tilesets

https://grafxkid.itch.io/sprite-pack-6

https://seliel-the-shaper.itch.io/treasure-chests

https://rottingpixels.itch.io/cave-platformer-tileset-16x16free

Yazan movement

Jump : Z key

Move left : D or Right arrow

Move Right : A or Left arrow

Elaf Movement

Jump : X key 

Move left : S or Down arrow

Move right : W or Up arrow
